name: Snail Against Squirrel
overview: Object of the game - Gather ripe nuts from the lower left and right corners of the screen. When a nut is ripe enough to be gathered, there will be a special sound to draw your attention. - Up on the top screen is your cave. Each of your caves is only enough to store 5 nuts. - Preparing as many caves as you possibly can, which will assure a happy and warm winter for the little squirrel.
